file_content.text:
ACHIEVEMENT MISSION Reward: Aratech Ice
Complete the following missions in master difficulty mode:
[MASTER] Flashpoint: Esseles [MASTER] Flashpoint: Taral V [MASTER] Flashpoint: Maelstrom Prison [MASTER] Flashpoint: Directive 7 [MASTER] Flashpoint: The Battle of Ilum [MASTER] Flashpoint: The False Emperor [MASTER] Flashpoint: Kaon Under Siege [MASTER] Flashpoint: Lost Island

ACHIEVEMENT MISSION Reward: Aratech Nightscythe
Defeat the following Operations bosses in Veteran mode:
Annihilation Droid XRR-3, Gharj, Soa, Bonethrasher, G4-B3 Heavy Fabricator, Karagga, Zorn and Toth, Colonel Vorgath, and Kephess.

ACHIEVEMENT MISSION Reward: Praxon Firaxa
Defeat the following Operations bosses in Master mode:
Annihilation Droid XRR-3, Gharj, Soa, Bonethrasher, G4-B3 Heavy Fabricator, Karagga, Zorn and Toth, Colonel Vorgath, and Kephess.

ACHIEVEMENT MISSION Reward: Aratech Fire
Defeat the following operations bosses in Story mode:
Annihilation Droid XRR-3, Gharj, Soa, Bonethrasher, G4-B3 Heavy Fabricator, Karagga, Zorn and Toth, Colonel Vorgath, and Kephess.

ACHIEVEMENT MISSION Reward: Aratech Coral
Defeat the following world bosses:
Snowblind, Gargath, Primal Destroyer, and Nightmare Pilgrim.
